attributes.action: make it a legal requirement that everybody over the age of 65 has to take a retest to retain there driving licence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They should be able to prove that they are capable of driving at a speed commenserate with road conditions.  They should be able to show that they are at least capable of handling a vehicle at 60 mph and that they don't need to slow down to 30 mph at every little bend. They should be tested every 5 years thereafter.
